item.title: Using R and Python
item.description: R and Python are well-known programming languages that are useful tools to know how to use. In this demonstration I will be showing you how the reticulate package can be used to allow R and Python to talk to each other. #R code chunk library(reticulate) a <- "Thank" #Python code chunk a = "You" print(r.a,a) ## Thank You
